packagecontents: camileo H30 High Definition Digital Camcorder li-ion Rechargeable Battery remote Control hand Strap And Pouch power Adapter cables (video, Hdmi And Usb) lens Cover cleaning Cloth quick Start Guide software CD (user Manual, Arcsoft Media Converter, Arcsoft Media Impression)
marketinginformation: The Handy Camileo H30 Combines High Functionality With Ease of Use For All Day Recording. With Its Quick Overview Menu Offering Easy Navigation, The 3" Touch Screen Allows Both Experienced Users as Well as Beginners to Get Creative. Thanks to The Video Stabilization of The Camileo H30, The Quality of All Clips And Photos is Clear Even When Using The 20x Zoom.
